Value.label: Saving state before power failure
Value.Help: Saving state before power failure. Default 0.

Item.label: 0 - State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
1 - State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to ON upon power restore
2 - State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

Value.label: Enable/disable to send the basic report
Value.Help: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed (When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically. Default 1.

Value.label: Default fade time.
Value.Help: Default fade time (unit is second, this value has the same function as Duration of Multilevel). Default 1.

Value.label: Setting minimum brightness value
Value.Help: Setting minimum brightness value, Valid value: 0 - 50, the bigger the value is, the higher the load’s minimum brightness is. Note: when configure this value, the value of Multilevel will be configured as 1 automatically so that users can preview the corre-sponding effect of minimum brightness value. Default 0.

Value.label: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network
Value.Help: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network (when enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a net-work)". Default 1.
